title: Broccoli Apple Salad
directions: In a large bowl combine broccoli, carrots, red onion, apples, pecans, and dried cranberries.
To make the dressing: Whisk together mayonnaise, greek yogurt, lemon juice, sugar, salt and pepper.
Add the dressing to the salad and toss to coat. Chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: 4 cups fresh broccoli florets, (about 2 medium heads)
2 large apples, finely chopped (I used gala apples)
½ cup low fat greek yogurt
